data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Omar Fernandez is on target to give Puebla a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 2, Pablo Gonzalez Diaz with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
In the minute 7, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
At Estadio Cuauhtemoc, Emanuel Gigliotti has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Leon are coming forward and David Ramirez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Leon a goal kick.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla's Pablo Gonzalez Diaz misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Puebla.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Puebla.
In the minute 28, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Puebla.
Angel Mena gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 36, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
Andres Mosquera puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 42, An attacking Leon player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Angel Mena's penalty pulls one back for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Angel Mena (Leon) has been booked during the half time break!
In the minute 45, Nicolas Vikonis (Puebla) has received a yellow card from Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Juan Reynoso (Puebla) is making a first substitution, with Osvaldo Martinez replacing Daniel Alvarez.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Free kick Leon.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Montes for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 56, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Puebla Puebla's Christian Tabo is caught offside.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 61, Puebla are pushing forward but Omar Fernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
Leon have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 62, Luis Montes of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Christian Tabo for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Leon.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
The home team have replaced Christian Tabo with Salvador Reyes. This is the second substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
In the minute 65, Juan Reynoso is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Cuauhtemoc with Amaury Escoto replacing Santiago Ormeno.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Puebla a goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Puebla.
Throw-in Leon.
Leon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Puebla.
Puebla surge into the attack at Estadio Cuauhtemoc but Pablo Gonzalez Diazâ€™s header is off-target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Leon a goal kick.
In the minute 69, William Tesillo (Leon) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Leon in the half of Puebla.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo blows against Leon's Jose Rodriguez for offside.
The away team replace Jose Rodriguez with Joel Campbell.
In the minute 73, Free kick Puebla.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Puebla.
Puebla have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 75, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Leon throw-in in Puebla's half.
Leon drives forward and Jean Meneses gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, Pablo Gonzalez Diaz (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
Puebla make their fourth substitution with Alejandro Chumacero replacing Omar Fernandez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, In Puebla a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leon's David Ramirez is whistled for offside at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Cuauhtemoc.
In the minute 87, Leon's Angel Mena is on target but unsuccessful.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Leon's David Ramirez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cuauhtemoc. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Emanuel Gigliotti for the away team is judged to be offside.
Leon have a goal kick.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Nestor Vicente Vidrio is replacing Brayan Angulo for the home team.
